title: A Study to Investigate the Preventive Effect of AG-1749 Against the Recurrence of Gastric and Duodenal Ulcers During Long-term Treatment With Nonsteroid Anti-inflammatory Drug

operands.value: The patient was on nonsteroid anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) treatment on the day when consent was obtained
requires the long-term continuous treatment even after treatment with the investigational drug is started
The patient was confirmed to have a history of gastric ulcer or duodenal ulcer
Must have minimum age of 20 Years
Endoscopically confirmed gastric and/or duodenal ulcers on Day 1
Endoscopically confirmed active upper gastrointestinal hemorrhage on Day 1
Current or past history of aspirin-induced asthma or hypersensitivity to NSAIDs
Past or planned surgery affecting gastric acid secretion
Clinically significant hepatic or renal disorder
Serious cardiac dysfunction, hypertension, or hematological disorder

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Must have minimum age of 20 Years'), Symbol('The patient was confirmed to have a history of gastric ulcer or duodenal ulcer'), Symbol('The patient was on nonsteroid anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) treatment on the day when consent was obtained'), Symbol('requires the long-term continuous treatment even after treatment with the investigational drug is started'), Not(Or(Symbol('Clinically significant hepatic or renal disorder'), Symbol('Current or past history of aspirin-induced asthma or hypersensitivity to NSAIDs'), Symbol('Endoscopically confirmed active upper gastrointestinal hemorrhage on Day 1'), Symbol('Endoscopically confirmed gastric and/or duodenal ulcers on Day 1'), Symbol('Past or planned surgery affecting gastric acid secretion'), Symbol('Serious cardiac dysfunction, hypertension, or hematological disorder'))))
